nfo.data

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfo.data.Settings

  • public abstract class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    Enumeration of various settings, the ArgumentParser may change these default values, depending on the command line interface arguments.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rio Alexandre

    • Field Summary

      static int ARGUMENT_PROFILE 
      static int ARGUMENT_SILENT 
      static int ARGUMENT_VERBOSE 
      static boolean createGUI
      If set to false no Graphical User Interface will be created.
      static java.lang.String output
      If null the standard output is used, otherwise its interpreted as a path and the output is streamed in a file.
      static java.lang.String outputNfo 
      static boolean silent
      If set to true no message will be printed.
      static boolean verbose
      If set to false minimum number of message will be printed.
